metadata.title: CVE-2019-9746 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: In libwebm before 2019-03-08, a NULL pointer dereference caused by thefunctions OutputCluster and OutputTracks in webm_info.cc will trigger anabort, which allows a DoS attack, a similar issue to CVE-2018-19212.

criterions.comment: oxide-qt: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
